author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
A brief comment on the recent appearance of Eric Weinstein and Sean Carroll on Piers Morgan's show, and the fallout that followed afterwards. 

The Piers Morgan clip is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5m7LnLgvMnM
The interview with Curt Jaimungal is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ILlhFKuu3NQ

title: The Problem with Eric Weinstein
